text: Indeed, Allah is with the patient. [2:153]
And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance. [54:17]
And He found you lost and guided. [93:7]
Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive. [11:61]
So remember Me; I will remember you. [2:152]
And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him a way out. [65:2]
And My mercy encompasses all things. [7:156]
And Allah would not punish them while they seek forgiveness. [8:33]
Indeed, good deeds do away with misdeeds. [11:114]
And whoever puts his trust in Allah, then He will suffice him. [65:3]
Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear. [2:286]
Indeed, with hardship comes ease. [94:6]
And be steadfast in patience, for indeed Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of those who do good. [11:115]
So verily, with every difficulty, there is relief. [94:5]
And whoever does righteous deeds and is a believer - he will neither fear injustice nor deprivation. [20:112]
And He gives you of all that you ask for. [14:34]
Our Lord, forgive us our sins and excesses in our affairs and plant firmly our feet. [3:147]
And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs. [33:3]
Say, 'My success is only by Allah.' [11:88]
And whoever believes in Allah - He will guide his heart. [64:11]
And when I am ill, it is He who cures me. [26:80]
And whoever fears Allah - He will make for him of his matter ease. [65:4]
Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. [98:7]
And when you are determined, then rely upon Allah. [3:159]
And say, 'My Lord, increase me in knowledge.' [20:114]
And whoever is grateful, his gratitude is only for the benefit of his own soul. [31:12]
So verily, remember Me, and I will remember you. [2:152]
And if you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor]. [14:7]
And be patient, for indeed Allah does not allow the reward of those who do good to be lost. [11:115]
Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful. [2:199]
Say, 'In the bounty of Allah and in His mercy - in that let them rejoice.' [10:58]
And Allah loves the doers of good. [3:134]
Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good. [16:128]
But Allah is your protector, and He is the best of helpers. [3:150]
And whoever holds firmly to Allah has [indeed] been guided to a straight path. [3:101]
Indeed, the mercy of Allah is near to the doers of good. [7:56]
And whoever saves one - it is as if he had saved mankind entirely. [5:32]
And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied. [93:5]
For indeed, it is not the eyes that are blinded, but blinded are the hearts which are within the breasts. [22:46]
Our Lord, pour upon us patience and let us die as Muslims. [7:126]
